segments.text: I see the woman standing in the puddle of water, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's surprising how she doesn't notice the water overflowing from the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice her foot is already in the water, but she doesn't seem to mind.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just focused on drying that plate, like it's the most important thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she's daydreaming or just really dedicated to her chores.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is making such a mess, and she doesn't even turn around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she doesn't slip and fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the children in the background, trying to get cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They seem to be having fun, but they need to be more careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she should turn off the faucet and check on the kids.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the garden outside looks so peaceful and well-kept.
segments.speaker: PAR
